short_summary: The prociement is for purchase and delivery of office seating to Edmonton, Alberta by March 15, 2024.
full_summary:
**Purchase and Delivery of Office Seating for the Alberta Region**
==============================================================

**Government of Canada Tender Notice**
--------------------------------------

### Tender Reference Information

| **Information** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | cb-453-95493541 |
| **Solicitation Number** | 100025120 |
| **Publication Date** | November 30, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | December 28, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST |

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada, through Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC), is soliciting a proposal for the purchase and delivery of office seating to Edmonton, Alberta. This purchase will be made under the Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H.

The seating requirements include:

* Rotary chairs and rotary stools (Product sub-category 1)
* Side chairs (Product sub-category 2)

### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible to bid, suppliers must be pre-qualified and have a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under the SA # E60PQ-120001/H. Non-SA holders may submit a bid, but must also submit a SA request to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation. The SAA will issue an SA to eligible suppliers for the products and services contained in their bid.

### Important Dates

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 28, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST

### Contracting Authority and Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Employment and Social Development Canada
* **Contact Person**: Azlyn Roslan
* **Email**: [azlyn.roslan@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:azlyn.roslan@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 794-1696
* **Fax**: Not available

### Tender Status

The tender status for this procurement is EXPIRED.

### Attachments

The tender document is available on the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The download links for the tender document are:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
